mapper.select: SELECT d.thLocation ,a.mNameKor ,a.mSeq ,a.mAgeLimit ,a.src FROM Movie a INNER JOIN date b ON b.Movie_mSeq = a.mSeq INNER JOIN screen c ON c.scSeq = b.screen_scSeq INNER JOIN Theater d ON d.thSeq = c.Theater_thSeq WHERE 1=1 AND mSeq= #{mSeq} group by d.thLocation

SELECT d.thName ,d.thLocation ,a.mSeq FROM Movie a INNER JOIN date b ON b.Movie_mSeq = a.mSeq INNER JOIN screen c ON c.scSeq = b.screen_scSeq INNER JOIN Theater d ON d.thSeq = c.Theater_thSeq WHERE 1=1 AND mSeq= #{mSeq} AND thLocation = #{thLocation} group by d.thName

SELECT d.thName ,d.thLocation ,a.mSeq ,b.dDate ,c.scTotalSeat ,c.scScreenType ,c.scNumber FROM Movie a INNER JOIN date b ON b.Movie_mSeq = a.mSeq INNER JOIN screen c ON c.scSeq = b.screen_scSeq INNER JOIN Theater d ON d.thSeq = c.Theater_thSeq WHERE 1=1 AND mSeq= #{mSeq} AND thLocation = #{thLocation} group by b.dDate;

SELECT d.thName ,d.thLocation ,a.mSeq ,b.dDate ,b.dTime ,c.scTotalSeat ,c.scScreenType ,c.scNumber FROM Movie a INNER JOIN date b ON b.Movie_mSeq = a.mSeq INNER JOIN screen c ON c.scSeq = b.screen_scSeq INNER JOIN Theater d ON d.thSeq = c.Theater_thSeq WHERE 1=1 AND mSeq= #{mSeq} AND thLocation = #{thLocation} AND thName = #{thName} AND DATE_FORMAT(b.dDate, '%Y-%m-%d') = #{dDate}

SELECT d.thName ,d.thLocation ,a.mSeq ,b.dDate ,b.dTime ,c.scTotalSeat ,c.scScreenType ,c.scNumber FROM Movie a INNER JOIN date b ON b.Movie_mSeq = a.mSeq INNER JOIN screen c ON c.scSeq = b.screen_scSeq INNER JOIN Theater d ON d.thSeq = c.Theater_thSeq WHERE 1=1 AND mSeq= #{mSeq} AND thLocation = #{thLocation} AND thName = #{thName} AND DATE_FORMAT(b.dDate, '%Y-%m-%d') = #{dDate} AND scNumber = #{scNumber} group by scNumber

SELECT d.thName ,d.thLocation ,a.mSeq ,b.dDate ,b.dTime ,c.scTotalSeat ,c.scScreenType ,c.scNumber ,c.scRow ,c.scCol FROM Movie a INNER JOIN date b ON b.Movie_mSeq = a.mSeq INNER JOIN screen c ON c.scSeq = b.screen_scSeq INNER JOIN Theater d ON d.thSeq = c.Theater_thSeq WHERE 1=1 AND mSeq= #{mSeq} AND thLocation = #{thLocation} AND thName like #{thName} AND DATE_FORMAT(b.dDate, '%Y-%m-%d') = #{dDate} AND b.dTime = #{dTime} AND c.scNumber = #{scNumber}

SELECT d.thName ,d.thLocation ,a.mSeq ,a.src ,a.mNameKor ,a.mAgeLimit ,b.dSeq ,b.dDate ,b.dTime ,c.scTotalSeat ,c.scScreenType ,c.scNumber ,c.scRow ,c.scCol ,e.stRow ,e.stCol ,e.stUseNy ,e.stPrice ,e.stSeq FROM Movie a INNER JOIN date b ON b.Movie_mSeq = a.mSeq INNER JOIN screen c ON c.scSeq = b.screen_scSeq INNER JOIN Theater d ON d.thSeq = c.Theater_thSeq INNER JOIN seat e ON e.scSeq = c.scSeq WHERE 1=1 AND mSeq= #{mSeq} AND thLocation = #{thLocation} AND thName like #{thName} AND DATE_FORMAT(b.dDate, '%Y-%m-%d') = #{dDate} AND b.dTime = #{dTime} AND c.scNumber = #{scNumber} AND e.stRow = #{stRow} AND e.stCol = #{stCol} AND e.stUseNy = 0
